Comments.Comments on Comments: Comments are a map of comment shorts and comment long forms. Comments are not displayed to the player, however anyone can mine the data files. So use Comments wisely. All Comments for a node must be in the Comments block of that node.
Comments.Copyright: You may use any Copyright you wish, but if you are submitting to the Dynamic Life team, please give us the right to distribute and modify your writing.

text: In which hands are held, for better or worse.

Comments.Branch Name comment: Branches can have any arbitrary name, however Pipe | character is not allowed. Primarily used to reference them. Must be unique inside tree.
Comments.Branch comment: Branches are the primary structure of the tree.
Comments.Brief comment: Each branch has a Brief description that is used in selection of the branch. It may be as simple as [Next] or [Continue], but may be as complicated as [You reach for the fruit, pluck it from the tree, and eat it.] Please keep it under 127 characters so that it will fit on a single line. This will not be enforced, so break this rule of thumb if necessary.
Comments.Leaves cocmment: The bulk of the actual writing is done in leaf form. Leaves are a flat structure, in order. They can contain no branching structures or other content, however they can be flagged or tagged with Warnings.

Comments.Leaf text comment: Raw text of the section, hard capped at 8000 characters. If you go over this amount, the text will not be displayed to the player.
Comments.Lorem Ipsum Continued: Note that  I continued Lorem ipsum from one leaf onto another, as one leaf per paragraphs. You can use more than one paragraph in a leaf, but this may make things easier.
